participant_1.background:
I'm a survivor and I'm dedicated to my passions.
when i have nothing else to do , i read books.
I am a writer who uses my travels as inspiration for my work.
I'm the one always tripping over my own two feet while running track.
i love to go to the lake.

participant_2.background:
I do laundry once a week to keep my home clean and tidy.
I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments.
My moped is the envy of everyone on my block because it's so colorful and unique.
i work in marketing.
My first purchase was a CD of my favorite band.

content.text: Hi there. I am a writer who uses my travels as inspiration for my work. I love to go to the lake. What do you do for fun?
Hello! I work in marketing and I like to dye my hair bright colors, but I have to be careful because of my theater commitments. What are some of your favorite books?
I love reading science fiction and fantasy books, but I also enjoy reading historical fiction and thrillers. What are your favorite books?
I love reading science fiction and fantasy books too! I also enjoy reading historical fiction and thrillers. My favorite book is The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy by Douglas Adams.
The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy is a great book! I also love the series of books by Terry Pratchett.
I have heard good things about the Terry Pratchett books, but I haven't read any of them yet. I'll have to add them to my list.
You should! They are really funny and entertaining.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
